response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its exceptional quality and value, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth and your potential interest, I propose selling it to you for $95. This price not only allows you to acquire an item valued at $80 by you but also ensures a fair return for me. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 95}
